select * from ( select page_type,type_id, '店铺主页(默认)' page_name , count(*) userCount ,sum(browse) browseCount from ( select page_type,type_id, user_id ,count(*) browse from weiit_user_page_log where page_type=0
and shop_id = #{shop_id}
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by user_id ) temp having userCount>0 union all select page_type,type_id, '会员主页(默认)' page_name , count(*) userCount ,sum(browse) browseCount from ( select page_type,type_id,user_id ,count(*) browse from weiit_user_page_log where page_type=1
and shop_id = #{shop_id}
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by user_id ) temp having userCount>0 union all select page_type,type_id, page_name , count(user_id) userCount ,sum(browse) browseCount from ( select p1.page_type,p1.type_id,c1.page_name as page_name,p1.user_id ,count(*) browse from weiit_user_page_log p1, weiit_page c1 where p1.type_id=c1.page_id and p1.page_type=2
and p1.shop_id = #{shop_id}
and date(p1.create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(p1.create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by p1.user_id,c1.page_name ) temp group by page_name union all select page_type,type_id, page_name , count(user_id) userCount ,sum(browse) browseCount from ( select p1.page_type,p1.type_id,c1.product_name as page_name ,p1.user_id ,count(*) browse from weiit_user_page_log p1, weiit_product c1 where p1.type_id=c1.product_id and p1.page_type=3
and p1.shop_id = #{shop_id}
and date(p1.create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(p1.create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by p1.user_id,c1.product_name ) temp group by page_name union all select page_type,type_id, page_name , count(user_id) userCount ,sum(browse) browseCount from ( select p1.page_type,p1.type_id,c1.group_name as page_name ,p1.user_id ,count(*) browse from weiit_user_page_log p1, weiit_product_group c1 where p1.type_id=c1.group_id and p1.page_type=4
and p1.shop_id = #{shop_id}
and date(p1.create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(p1.create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by p1.user_id,c1.group_name ) temp group by page_name ) temp1 order by browseCount desc
